text: Donya akhirat teuma jitanyong Hai aneuk yatim pakriban ulah Takheun pubuet got keu aneuk yatim Le gata bandum leupah that indah Meu tatem duek-duek ngon aneuk yatim Chedara teuh nyan bandum jih sudah Teuma di Tuhan cit Neuturi soe Nyang bit buet got soe nyang buet jih salah Meunyo Neukheundak uleh Hadharat Gata dum sisat tapubuet salah Keubit roe Tuhan leupah that teuga Ngon bijaksana areh that leupah
